text: it is not only a social problem but it
could also be a health problem snoring
is essentially something in the airway
that's vibrating and making noise as air
is flowing through our airway what can
we do about snoring well there's lots
one can do sometimes it's a matter of
sleep position so when folks lay on
their back their tongue falls back and
that tongue starts vibrating in the
Airways having negative pressure and
that leads to a lot of snoring when
people are laying on their back so
simply sleeping on your side you can
pull the tongue to the side keep the
airway open and that alleviates a lot of
snoring that's why there are a lot of
elbows in the night where someone's bed
partner hears the snoring tailbone and
they've changed position and the snoring
is actually better just based on sleep
position there are pillows made for this
there are an old remedy used to be the
to sew a tennis ball into the back of
one's shirt so that if you laid on your
back it was uncomfortable and you
actually move to the side but now there
are pillows that can do this
